thama adhikariye konayen balu wita ewan kriyawalin jathika ha jathyanthara thalayehi shri lankawe sanhindiyawa, samadanaya ha yali goda nagima sakshath kara thabima udesa athi sawimath kriyadamayak nanwimata saha shakthimath kirimata warthamanaye ganna prayathnayan gana waradi awabodhayak labadi, eewa idiriye wishala badhaka damimak da wana bawata da komisama kanassalla pala karayi. 9.41 ee nisa mema chodanawala sathyasathyathawaya thahawuru kara ganime aramunin mema karanaya pilibandawa swadhina wimarshanayak shri lanka aanduwa wisin pawathwa rate nithiyata anukulawa piyawara gatha yuthu bawa komisama rajayata nirdesha karayi.

ohu eekabaddha raliyata mahinda giyath manthriwaru giyath okkoma drohin asela piyumanthame masa 17 wanida eekabaddha wipakshaya hayid pitiyedi pawathwannata niyamitha raswime sanwidhayakayan, pakshikayan, apema manthriwarun menma hitapu janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha pawa eyata sambandha wuwath owun pakshayata drohi, pakshikayanta drohi ithama bhayanaka lesa iranaye mohomad mosadek parajaya kirimata si. ayi. ee. kriyathmaka wuwase mahinda rajapakshage parajayath iranaye mohomad mosadek parajaya kirimata si. ayi. ee. kriyathmaka wuwase mahinda rajapakshage parajayath salasum kala udaya gammanpilaerik gamini jinapriya iranaye mohomad mosadek parajaya kirimata amarikawe si. ayi. ee. sanwidhanaya kriyathmaka kala aakaraye salasumak mahinda mahinda rajapakshata oona tharam polis aarakshawa labadimata puluwan mahinda rajapakshata oona tharam polis aarakshawa labadimata puluwan - agamathi ranil wikramasinha ajith alahakon - akitha perera thrastha tharjanayanta lakwa sitina loka nayakayanta pawa aarakshawa laba denne ema ratawala polisiya bawath mahinda rajapaksha mahathata oona tharam polis aarakshawa mahinda kiwwata rajapaksha kalla kiwwe na; awasara ganimedi wu siddhiya gana hitapu amathi piyasena gamage ka mahinda kiwwata rajapaksha kalla kiwwe na; awasara ganimedi wu siddhiya gana hitapu amathi piyasena gamage kiyayi shrilanipa pakshikayanta nigraha kala wirawanshage oluwe amaruwak thiyanawa galla lalith chaminda saha es.

rajakiya panditha yatinuwara chandrarathana nahimiyan wahanse yatathe alapalawala shri shasanodaya piriwenin mulika adhyapanaya labu athara shri lanka ramanynya maha nikaye anunayakawa wada siti pujya baddegama wimalawansha nahimiyan wahanse yatathe kolambaa shri lanka widyaliya maha piriwenen usas adhyapanaya labiya. 1967 di kolambaa widyodaya wishwawidyalayen shasthrawedi upadhiya labaganimata unwahanse samath wuha. 1960 agosthu 25 wani dina kalani nadi udakukkhepa sima malakaye di adhisila upasampadawa labuha. 1967 sita 1976 dakwa anuradhapura nawanagaraye shri widyarathna piriwene niyojya pariwenadhipathi dhuraya isulu unwahanse 1976.11.01 dina guru sewayata athulath wi palamuwen ma lindawawa rajaye widuhale sewaya kala athara 1977 di anuradhapura mahabodhi widuhala 1986di anuradhapura pandukabhaya widuhala 1992di anuradhapura shanthajoshap widuhala yana widuhalwala sewaya kara atha. 1996.12.16 wani dina guru sewayen wishrama labuha.

thurki kurdisthanaye wan nagaraye jiwathwu bejan kurdi warunta wena ma rajyayak laba ganime meheyumata sahabhagi wuye wayasa awurudu 16 di ya.“mama yuddhayata kisiseth kamathi ha mage sihinaya wuye grantha kathuwariyaka wimaya. eheth apa jiwath wenne ewani lowaka noweyi” yanuwen bejan pawasuwa ya.aya dan kobani nagaraya islamiya aakramanikayingen aarakshakara ganima sandaha yomuwi atha.

yanuwen liyapu pothakin me nyaya idiripath kara...me nyayata anuwa deshapalana paksha athule monatharam prajathanthrawadaya thiyanawa kiwath aththata thiyanne paksha nayakayan tika denakuge adhipathithwayak (hewath kathapayadhipathithwayak)...eya pahasuwen kadiya nohaki bawath...yakadayen haduwa wani ayomaya shakthiyak athiwa kriyathmaka wena bawath eyin kiyawenawa...me nayakayangen balaya pahara ganna yamek uthsaha kaloth wenne owunwa paksha drohin bawata hanwadu gahala eliyata dana eka...mema thathwaya nirmanaya karana kondeshi wanne...nayakayan nathuwama bari wena tharamata athyawashyawima...bahuthara samajikathwaya saha pitatha indan pakshayata sahaya dena bahu janaya nayakan matha wishwasaya thabima...pakshaye prathipathhi walata wada nayakayan janayata wadagathwima...nayakayanta paksha aramudal pracharaka yantharaya saha sanwidhanaya palanaya kirimata labena shakthiya yanadi sadhaka wisin me thathwaya nirmanaya karanawa...ada ja wi pe saha yu en piya thula athi arbudayedi pennanne meka thama...nikan kandulu salala wadak naha...yana athak balagena gihilla aluthin patan ganne nathiwa...kalakata pera matha kalaye merata deshapalanaye radikalwadaya niyojanaya kala ja wi pe ada ema radikalwadaya gilihime thanata awilla...
ayiyo karumeka mahatha, polis niladhariyata ingrisi ba.
